display_long_description:
# EPIC BATTLES AT YOUR FINGERTIPS IN MIXED REALITY

The enemy lurks in the woods, and your kingdom stands on the brink. **Repel the coming assault!** With each night, new threats emerge — tougher enemies, varied tactics, and mounting pressure that will test your every decision.

[media]

# EXPAND YOUR ARMY AND FORTIFY YOUR KINGDOM

Strategize before nightfall. Invest in **Farms** to grow your economy, recruit **Archers, Swordsmen, Spearmen, Rangers, Knights** and special **Heroes**, and fortify your kingdom with **Towers, Walls,** and other **Traps** to prevent your **Castle** from falling.

[media]

# TAKE TACTICAL ADVANTAGE OF THE PROCEDURAL TERRAIN

Every map is procedurally generated. **Use the terrain to your advantage!** Divert enemy paths with **Walls**, place **Towers** and **Catapults** on high ground where they’re hard to reach, and lay **Thorns** and **Minefields** at choke points to slow the invaders.

[media]

# DEFEAT BOSSES, GET UPGRADES & CONQUER THE LEADERBOARDS

Each campaign world culminates in a climactic showdown against an imposing boss guarding the path forward. Battlefield **victories will earn you stars**, unlocking **upgrades for your troops, spells** & more!

[media]

# KEY FEATURES
- Hand tracking & controller support
- Procedural Levels & **Endless Campaign** with **Leaderboards**
- **15 Playable Cards** & Specialization Tree with **37 Upgrades**
- Epic **Boss Battles** & **13 Unique Enemy** types
- And more to come with future updates!

Join the community: **notsuspicious.biz/discord**
